wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Swain was an English professional association footballer who played as a wing half. He played one game for Burnley in the Football League Second Division in the 1903–04 season.

response: * Joseph Swain (academic) (1857–1927), American president of Indiana University
* Joseph Swain (engraver) (1820–1909), English wood-engraver associated with Punch magazine
* Joseph Swain (poet) (1761–1796), British Baptist minister and hymnwriter
